00020 #ifndef NCS_FILE_COLLECTION
00021 #define NCS_FILE_COLLECTION
00022 
00023 #include "customtypes.h"
00024 #include "nlxerror.h"
00025 #include "ncsfile.h"
00026 
00027 #include <fstream>
00028 
00029 using namespace std;
00030 
00034 class NCSFileCollection
00035 {
00036         public:
00040                 NCSFileCollection(bool reverse = false) : n(0),reverse(reverse),recordDuration(-1),t(-1),minGap(-1) { files = new NCSFile[NCS_MAX_N_CHANNELS]; };
00044                 virtual ~NCSFileCollection() { delete[] files; };
00049                 virtual void set(bool reverse) { this->reverse = reverse; };
00054                 virtual void add(string filename);
00059                 virtual void open() throw(NLXError);
00063                 virtual void close();
00067                 virtual void init() throw(NLXError);
00072                 virtual long getNRecords();
00077                 virtual bool readRecord();
00081                 virtual void skipMissingRecords();
00085                 virtual void fillMissingRecords(ofstream &output);
00089                 virtual void writeRecord(ofstream &output);
00093                 virtual void showFileHeaders();
00098                 virtual Time getTimestamp() { return t; };
00103                 virtual Time getRecordDuration() { return recordDuration; };
00108                 virtual Time getGap() { return minGap; };
00113                 virtual Frequency getFrequency() { if ( n == 0 ) return 0; else return files[0].frequency; };
00114 
00115         private:
00116 
00120                 NCSFile         *files;
00124                 int                     n;
00128                 bool                    reverse;
00132                 Time                    recordDuration;
00136                 Time                    t0;
00140                 Time                    t;
00145                 Time                    minGap;
00149                 Data                    buffer[NCS_N_SAMPLES_PER_RECORD*NCS_MAX_N_CHANNELS];
00150 };
00151 
00152 #endif
